extensionName.description: Name of the extension and the native receiver selector window title.

extensionDescription.message: Aktiviert Chromecast-Support zum Streamen von Web-Apps (wie Netflix oder BBC iPlayer), HTML5-Video und Bildschirm-/Tabfreigaben.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension shown in the add-ons manager.

popupMediaTypeApp.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for current site's sender application.

popupMediaTypeTab.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for current tab.

popupMediaTypeScreen.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for screen.

popupMediaTypeFile.description: Receiver selector media type <option> text for opening a file selector dialog.

popupCastButtonTitle.description: Button text for each receiver entry in the receiver selector.

popupCastingButtonTitle.description: Button text while establishing a session in the receiver selector. Ellipsis cycles (. → .. → ...) as loading indicator.

contextCast.description: Main context menu item title. Ellipsis indicates additional information required as it triggers opening of receiver selector.

contextAddToWhitelist.description: Top-level whitelist context menu item title.

contextAddToWhitelistRecommended.description: Context menu item title for recomended match pattern.

contextAddToWhitelistAdvancedAdd.description: Context menu item title for all other match patterns.

optionsBridgeLoading.description: Loading placeholder text for bridge section on options page.

optionsBridgeNotFoundStatusText.message: Versuchen Sie die neuste Version herunterzuladen und zu installieren.
optionsBridgeNotFoundStatusText.description: Bridge not found additional description text

optionsBridgeStatsExpectedVersion.description: Bridge stats expected version row title.

optionsBridgeStatsRecommendedAction.description: Bridge stats recommended action row title.

optionsBridgeOlderAction.message: Bridge-Version älter als erwartet, versuchen Sie auf die neuste Version zu aktualisieren.
optionsBridgeOlderAction.description: Recommended action for when the installed bridge version is older than the installed extension version.

optionsBridgeNewerAction.message: Bridge-Version neuer als erwartet, versuchen Sie die Erweiterung auf die neuste Version zu aktualisieren.
optionsBridgeNewerAction.description: Recommended action for when the installed bridge version is newer than the installed extension version.

optionsBridgeNoAction.description: Recommended action for when both bridge and extension versions are compatible or likely compatible.

optionsBridgeUpdateChecking.description: Update check button title while in progress. Ellipsis cycles (. → .. → ...) as loading indicator.

optionsBridgeUpdateStatusNoUpdates.description: Update status if no updates are found.

optionsBridgeUpdateStatusError.description: Update status if an error was encountered checking for updates.

optionsBridgeUpdateAvailable.description: Update status if an update was found.

optionsBridgeUpdate.description: Update now button title. Ellipsis indicates additional information as it triggers an update window popup.

optionsMediaCategoryName.description: Options page media casting category title.

optionsMediaCategoryDescription.description: Options page media casting category description.

optionsMediaSyncElementDescription.message: Status (Wiedergabe, Lautstärke, Untertitel, etc...) zwischen dem Media-Element und dem Empfängergerät synchronisieren.

optionsMediaStopOnUnload.message: Wiedergabe auf dem Empfänger beim verlassen der Seite beenden
optionsMediaStopOnUnload.description: Media stop on unload checkbox label.

optionsLocalMediaCategoryName.description: Options page local media category title.

optionsLocalMediaCategoryDescription.message: HTTP-Server, der von der Bridge zum Streamen lokaler Mediendateien an den Empfänger gestartet wird.
optionsLocalMediaCategoryDescription.description: Options page local media category description.

optionsReceiverSelectorCategoryName.description: Options page receiver selector category title.

optionsReceiverSelectorCategoryDescripti.description: Options page receiver selector category description.

optionsReceiverSelectorTypeBrowser.description: Receiver selector type browser radio option label.

optionsReceiverSelectorTypeNative.description: Receiver selector type native radio option label.

optionsReceiverSelectorWaitForConnection.description: Receiver selector wait for connection option checkbox label.

optionsReceiverSelectorWaitForConnection.message: Empfängerauswahl bleibt geöffnet bis die Verbindung aufgebaut ist oder die Verbindung fehlschlägt.
optionsReceiverSelectorWaitForConnection.description: Receiver selector wait for connection option description.

optionsReceiverSelectorCloseIfFocusLost.description: Receiver selector close if focus lost option checkbox label.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistCategoryDescrip.message: Seiten auf denen der Useragent aus kompatibilitätsgründen mit einer Chrome-Version ersetzt wird. Suchmuster müssen gültig sein.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistBasicView.description: Switch to basic view button title.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistRawView.description: Switch to raw view button title.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistSaveRaw.description: Save raw view edits button title.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistAddItem.description: Add new whitelist item button title.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistEditItem.description: Edit whitelist item button title. Displayed on each item.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistRemoveItem.description: Remove whitelist item button title. Displayed on each item.

optionsUserAgentWhitelistInvalidMatchPat.description: Error displayed by input indicating an invalid match pattern.

optionsMirroringAppIdDescription.message: App-ID einer registrierten Chromecast-Empfängeranwendung. Nur für fortgeschrittene Anwender. Muss mit der Standard-App kompatibel sein (siehe GitHub-Repository).

optionsAirPlayDeviceManager.description: Label for the options page AirPlay device manager control.

optionsAirPlayDeviceManagerNoDevices.description: Message displayed in the AirPlay device manager when there are no paired devices to display.

optionsAirPlayDeviceManagerNewName.description: Label for the AirPlay device manager new device name field.

optionsAirPlayDeviceManagerNewAddress.description: Label for the AirPlay device manager new device name field.

optionsAirPlayDeviceManagerNewSubmit.description: Label for the AirPlay device manager new device submit button.

optionsAirPlayDevicePair.description: AirPlay device pair button label. Ellipsis indicates additional action required as it requires the user to enter additional info (pairing PIN).

optionsAirPlayDevicePairedStatusPaired.description: AirPlay device status for paired devices.

optionsAirPlayDevicePairedStatusUnpaired.description: AirPlay device status for unpaired devices.

optionsAirPlayDeviceCredentialsClientId.description: AirPlay device credentials client ID table header.

optionsAirPlayDeviceCredentialsPrivateKe.description: AirPlay device credentials private key table header.

optionsAirPlayDeviceCredentialsPublicKey.description: AirPlay device credentials public key table header.

optionsAirPlayDeviceCredentialsRegenerat.description: AirPlay device credentials regenerate button label.

optionsAirPlayDeviceCredentialsCopyToCli.description: AirPlay device credentials copy to clipbard button label.

optionsSaved.description: Status text displayed by save button once options have been successfully saved.
